items.text: bunts this to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Neesham, 1 run

items.text: driven with the spin but can't pierce the infield. End of an excellent Shakib spell
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to de Grandhomme, no run

items.text: length ball angling in from wide of the crease, defended with soft hands
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Neesham, no run

items.text: lofted cleanly, timed well and this races to the short boundary at cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Neesham, FOUR runs

items.text: full and straight on middle and leg, kept out
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Neesham, no run

items.text: slips this down leg, there's a fumble from Mushfiqur but no damage done. Just the wide added to the tally, something Bangladesh can ill afford
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Neesham, 1 wide

items.text: steered down to square third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Neesham, 1 run

items.text: chipped over midwicket, mid-on can't get there. Heart-in-the-mouth moment for the New Zealand dressing room. This one gripped the surface and deviated a fair bit
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Grandhomme, 1 run

items.text: glides this straight to point
items.postText: It's time for a change in controls. Ankur is back to take you through till the end. An exciting finish in the offing.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Neesham, no run

items.text: length outside off, nearly drags it back on, just misses the off stump and races away to the fine leg boundary
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to de Grandhomme, FOUR runs

items.text: full on the pads, clipped to fine-leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to de Grandhomme, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, chopped away towards point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Neesham, no run

items.text: full outside off, Neesham squeezes it away towards deep cover to turn over the strike
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Neesham, 1 run

items.text: Shaifuddin breathes life into the game! Slower ball outside off, a short one, de Grandhomme goes for the ramp but because of the slowness of the delivery can't get it high enough over the keeper, and has Mushfiqur made amends for the earlier miss? excellent take, timed his jump perfectly
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to de Grandhomme, OUT

dismissal.text: C de Grandhomme c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mohammad Saifuddin 15 (23m 13b 2x4 0x6) SR: 115.38

items.text: full outside off, a tentative prod forward and beats him
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Santner, no run

items.preText:
Spin

Graeme: "With the way this tournaments been every black cap supporter will be looking decidedly worried at the moment "
items.text: full outside off, pushed to cover where the fielder makes a tumbling save
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, no run

items.text: full on off, pushed to cover again
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, no run

items.text: what an inspired change! or was it just a poor stroke? neesham can't resiist going over the top, takes on the full ball on off, and lofts it straight to long-off, and Bangladesh are well and truly back into this now
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, OUT

dismissal.text: JDS Neesham c Soumya Sarkar b Mosaddek Hossain 25 (54m 33b 2x4 1x6) SR: 75.75

items.text: full on the pads, tucked away to deep midwicket for one
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Henry, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, driven to long-off for one
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Santner, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Henry, no run

items.text: full on off, hit hard into the ground and bounces over the bowler's head for a single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Santner, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, pushed to deep cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Henry, 1 run

items.text: full on middle and leg, he plants his leg across and is struck seemingly in front but the umpire says no and Bangladesh have no reviews left. He played back to one that was too full and that looked out
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Santner, no run

items.text: edged and four! Full and angled across, pushes at it, gets the edge but there's no slip
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Santner, FOUR runs
